New Records: Anthony Edwards broke Kevin Garnett's record for the most consecutive 20+ point games to start a season during the game against the Portland Trail Blazers.
Key Match Events: The game itself where Anthony Edwards made history with his performance.
Post-Match Reflections: The Minnesota Timberwolves are in a three-game losing streak following the game.
The Portland Trail Blazers improved to 5-8 in 13 games after the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Timberwolves will play the Sacramento Kings next, while the Trail Blazers face the Atlanta Hawks.
